name: Mark Pascall
description: Passionate about all things decentralised / blockchain for public good. Founder of The Wellbeing Protocol (building community wellbeing DAOs) and one of the founding members of the Metacartel Venture DAO. Career highlights include: featured in TVNZ documentary, running the first University course in the world on DAOs, bringing Vitalik Buterin and Andreas Antonopoulos over to NZ, co-founding BlockchainLabs,
